definition: A software program designed to be used on a mobile device, typically providing specific functionality or services, often downloaded from an online store. It is commonly used to enhance the user experience, provide entertainment, or assist with various tasks.

examples.german: Ich habe eine neue App auf meinem Smartphone installiert.
examples.english: I installed a new app on my smartphone.

examples.german: Diese App hilft dir beim Lernen von Vokabeln.
examples.english: This app helps you learn vocabulary.

examples.german: Die App bietet viele n√ºtzliche Funktionen.
examples.english: The app offers many useful features.

examples.german: Mit dieser App kannst du deine Finanzen verwalten.
examples.english: With this app, you can manage your finances.
